directions: Combine kidney beans, onion, hard-boiled eggs, pickles, mayonnaise, and celery in a large bowl until well combined. Season with salt and black pepper.
Refrigerate 8 hours to overnight to allow flavors to combine.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can dark red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Kidney Bean and Sweet Pickle Salad
